project

Class Coordinates

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.Coordinates

  • public class Coordinates
extends java.lang.Object
    Class created to handle the coordinates and coordinates related methods of all entities.

      Class constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Getter to return the x position of the entity.

      • getY

        public int getY()
        Getter to return the x position of the entity.

      • updateCoords

        public static void updateCoords(Agent agent,
                Coordinates newCoordinates)
        Method that updates the coordinates of an agent to those of the received new coordinates.
        Parameters:
        agent - Agent whose coordinates are going to be updated.
        newCoordinates - New coordinates of the agent.

      • addFOV

        public void addFOV(int fov)
        Method that is used when there is no object in the sight of the agent. It checks all possible coordinates inside the agent's fov except the current one and chooses a random one inside the environment for the agent to move.

      • distanceBetween

        public static int distanceBetween(Coordinates coords_1,
                  Coordinates coords_2)
        Method that receives two different coordinates and returns the distance between them.
        Parameters:
        coords_1 - First coordinate received.
        coords_2 - Second coordinate received.
        Returns:
        This method returns the difference between both received coordinates.

      • inEnvironment

        public int inEnvironment(int x,
                int y)
        Method that checks if Coordinates are inside the Environment
        Returns:
        This method returns -1 in case of error or 1 in case of success
